message:
osascript <<EndOfScript 
set fenster to do shell script "plutil -convert xml1 -o - /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist | grep -A 1 SHOWFULLNAME | tail -n 1 | tr -d \"\\t\\n\""
tell application "System Events"
keystroke "<user name##gt##"
if fenster is "<true/>" then
	keystroke tab
	delay 0.5
else
	keystroke return
	delay 2
end if
keystroke "<password##gt##"
delay 0.5
keystroke return 
end tell
EndOfScript
Script must run as root
is a variable from a german... mir ham keine windows mir ham nur fenschter
